extension.name: Announcements Display
extension.author: HUBzero
extension.description: This module allows the display of announcements

field.name: container
field.label: Content Container
field.description: A CSS ID for a content container

field.name: numitems
field.label: Items
field.description: Enter number of news items to display

field.name: show_morelink
field.label: More link
field.description: Show 'read more' link for each announcement

field.name: show_viewall
field.label: View all link
field.description: Show 'view all' link for all announcements

field.name: show_search
field.label: Item search
field.description: Show a search box for announcements

field.name: show_subscribe
field.label: Subscribtion option
field.description: Show an option to subscribe to feed/maillist

field.name: webpath
field.label: Image path
field.description: Enter the path to item images

field.name: default_image
field.label: Default image
field.description: Enter full path to the default image

field.name: subscribe_path
field.label: Path to subscription page
field.description: Enter the url of rss feed or maillist subscription page

field.name: subscribe_label
field.label: Label for subscribe link
field.description: Enter the text for the subscription link

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
